certificateCheck.title: Certificate verification
certificateCheck.subtitle: Enter the certificate identification number below to verify the certificate.
certificateCheck.validityInfo: The search is performed for shipments no older than 1 year.
certificateCheck.validityWarning: Certificates, issued after 2025.xx.xx, can be checked here

certificateIntro.title: Issuance of Veterinary Certificates
certificateIntro.subtitle: On this portal you can check the validity of issued certificates
